name: Ocean
lyric:
Look into your eyes
To me they're singing
Songs of the whales
Like undercurrents
Rushing through my veins
Turning into hurricanes

You're the origin
You're the consequence
And everything inbetween
You are the questions
You are the answers
Finally I'm free

I'm like raindrops
Falling on the river
Turning into waves
Flowing to the ocean
I'll sing like raindrops
Falling on the river
Turning into waves
Sailing in the ocean of your heart

Sunlight is splashing on your beauty
Full of jealousy
I see no border, beyond the horizon
Only you and me
Moonlight is falling onto your body
Flowing like a dream
Forget gravity
Kiss for all time into eternity

I'm like raindrops
Falling on the river
Turning into waves
Flowing to the ocean
I'll sing like raindrops
Falling on the river
Turning into waves
Sailing in the ocean of your heart
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 沉城 编辑于2019-09-11 15:20

comments.brief: sailing in the ocean of your heart~~~那个大三和弦还多好耍~~~
喜欢词 调也很明快啊&gt;&lt;
